Articles.Content:
Was hoping someone could tell me the approximate time it takes to coast from LKO to MÃƒÂ¼nar orbit.

Edited May 21, 2014 by Jodo42

It depends on the injection burn. Assuming a 'normal' injection burn (between about 850 and 900 m/s) the time can vary from about 4.5 hours up to something like 10 or 12 hours for a poorly planned burn. You can get there faster (or slower!) by burning more fuel.

Was hoping someone could tell me the approximate time it takes to coast from LKO to MÃƒÂ¼nar orbit.

My average time (Using Mechjeb) is about 8 hrs. Though with

REal time is about 15 minutes.
Yeah, for optimal fuel usage it's about 8 hours. But I tend to run more like 4 or 5, I find the nodes easier to set up that way even if it does use a bit more fuel.
